channel.title: Account management web interface
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mmAQStb.png[/img]
Noticed this today and realized how easy it would be to implement. I used to log in at random times just to see if my friends were logged into Runescape so I could hang out with them. If back then, I had a website that could tell me in real time who on my friends list were logged into the game already, I would have been much more active for longer periods of time.
I also like how RSCE has the real time display of number of players logged in too. I can sit there and watch the number fluctuate without refreshing the page.

item.title: Account management web interface
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Screenshots from here are what I have that is available for open source use with MoparClassic. Right now it is looking like there will be tabs at the top of the forum for accessing different pages but I am not clear on exactly what Rodgerwilco has in mind with that just yet. The website was designed by my friend Elite with the goal of open source.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Website code is available for SVN checkout here utilizing a PHPBB forum under the “lupus” folder:
https://www.assembla.com/code/lupus_regnum/subversion/nodes

Shared SQL database named “LupusRegnum.sql” is located under the “Server” folder:
https://www.assembla.com/code/lupus_regnum/subversion/nodes/32/Server

The Lupus Regnum project is a customized version of DarkQuest that Peeter created.

Read full topic

item.title: Account management web interface
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

Do we have/are we getting a web front that we can add these types of functionality to? I thought we just had a webclient.

Read full topic

item.title: Account management web interface
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

If you have a table in the database that uses the memory storage engine (which the rscd database does) then querying it is very quick. From memory, I think the table in question is called ‘online’.
Basically you could use caching in PHP to cache the value for 3 seconds at a time and in doing so you’re querying a memory table 20 times per minute. The cost of doing so? Negligible at best.

Read full topic

item.title: Account management web interface
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=650058.msg4365597#msg4365597 date=1379619466]

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:531295”]Yes, cause what we need are add ons to slow down the game/site…

Don’t get me wrong I would love something like this but it just affects performance especially on larger servers.[/quote]

Can you back to where you came from…
How would this slowdown the game?
How would this slowdown the site?

Cleako, do you play old school or rs3?
-server have 500 players on
-server has to go from the host db to the server
-server has to go to the host db
-unless done properly will just be a mess

Read full topic
